comments.author: Julian Reschke
comments.body: The proposed change fetches 64K nodes at once. The test cases pass, but it would be good if somebody else did a sanity check before I commit the change.

comments.author: Jukka Zitting
comments.body: Looks good to me and works for simple tests, so I merged also this one to the 2.4 branch. Revision 1233349.

description: The PM consistency checker should use the paging feature to fetch nodeIds in chunks, and also not rely on the total number of ids for logging purposes.
summary: consistency check should get node ids in chunks, not rely on total count
